pageProduct.name: Antipodes Glow Ritual Vitamin C Serum With Hyalurolic Acid 30ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Skin glows with this natural Vitamin C serum that provides instant illumination and protection against the damage that can lead to early aging.
 
The gentle, light and ultra-clean formulation contains Kakadu plum, with up to 100 times the Vitamin C of oranges, to help brighten skin, boost collagen and protect. Vinanza® Grape & Kiwi addresses pigmentation. Plant hyaluronic acid boosts water and bakuchiol helps smooth lines.

Warnings

EXTERNAL USE ONLY. PATCH TEST FIRST. DO NOT USE IF
ALLERGIC TO CONTENTS. AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES;
IF CONTACT OCCURS IMMEDIATELY RINSE WITH WATER.
IN THE UNLIKELIHOOD OF NEGATIVE SKIN REACTION
DISCONTINUE USE AND CONSULT A HEALTH EXPERT.
STORE IN COOL DARK PLACE BELOW 26°C/78°F. PURE
INGREDIENTS FROM NATURE MAY RESULT IN COLOR
VARIATIONS BETWEEN BATCHES. CONTAINS NUT OIL.

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: Aqua, glycerin, Terminalia ferdinandiana (kakadu
plum) fruit extract, sodium acrylates copolymer & lecithin, benzyl alcohol; dehydroacetic acid, mica, iron oxide, titanium dioxide, sodium hyaluronate, potassium sorbate, sodium phytate; alcohol, Vitis vinifera (grape) seed extract, (Vinanza® Grape), Actinidia deliciosa (kiwi) fruit extract, (Vinanza® kiwi), bakuchiol, Persea gratissima (avocado pear) oil, fragrance of vanilla pod and mandarin: coumarin†, d-Limonene†, linalool†.
† Component of essential oil

Directions

Use Glow Ritual Vitamin C Serum every morning after cleansing and before your Antipodes® eye cream and moisturiser.
 
Massage drops of the Vitamin C face gel into your face, neck and décolletage using upward strokes.
 
Perfect to instantly illuminate dull skin.
